replies.body: Can't wait to attached to my adc and let them play the game for me.
Any chance in among the champion ARAM buffs you'd like to do something for Ivern's passive since it has zero use.

> "as well as encouraging non-users to experiment with the item"
*shivers in runeglaive ezreal*
When is the chroma for Blood Moon Yasuo coming out?

Any chance of reverting Conqueror to before it was ruined? Nerfing it will just mean the three champs who are currently broken with it will stop using it and no one will.

P.S. Yuumi looks very cool. ðŸ™‚

Aaand just like that they killed rageblade. The only champs I can see still using it are Kog and Kayle. Varus and Vayne are out, they take too long to proc, unless you have a team that centres around defending the adc.
{{champion:63}} didn't need a buff.  Guess I'll know who to permaban in sup lane now.

AP Trynd nerfs when he didn't have a high win rate even when the cool down of his E was that low last time. 

I guess I should just be thankful they didn't just remove the AP ratios like they did when they remade aatrox.
ARAM balance changes..... when are you going to do something about the corki passive? with everything else the games are usually decided well before he has his first access to it.
